<li id="cite_note-363"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-363">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20151210212235/http://www.inegi.org.mx/est/contenidos/proyectos/encuestas/hogares/especiales/ei2015/doc/eic2015_resultados.pdf" rel="nofollow">"Principales resultados de la Encuesta Intercensal 2015 Estados Unidos Mexicanos"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/INEGI" title="INEGI">INEGI</a>. p. 1. <li id="cite_note-364"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-364">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFSmith2010">Smith, Dr. Claire M. (August 2010). <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20131024051944/https://www.overseasvotefoundation.org/files/counting%20american%20civilians%20abroad.pdf" rel="nofollow">"These are our Numbers: Civilian Americans Overseas and Voter Turnout"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <i>OVF Research Newsletter</i>. Overseas Vote Foundation. Archived from <a class="external text" href="https://www.overseasvotefoundation.org/files/counting%20american%20civilians%20abroad.pdf" rel="nofollow">the original</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span> on 24 October 2013<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">9 September</span> 2018</span>. <q>Previous research indicates that the number of U.S. Americans living in Mexico is around 1 million, with 600,000 of those living in Mexico City.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=OVF+Research+Newsletter&amp;rft.atitle=These+are+our+Numbers%3A+Civilian+Americans+Overseas+and+Voter+Turnout&amp;rft.date=2010-08&amp;rft.aulast=Smith&amp;rft.aufirst=Dr.+Claire+M.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.overseasvotefoundation.org%2Ffiles%2Fcounting%2520american%2520civilians%2520abroad.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMexico"></span></span>
</li>

</li>

<li id="cite_note-427"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-427">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20070930043448/http://www.sandiegometro.com/2003/dec/coverstory2.html" rel="nofollow">"2016 Binational Olympics"</a>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-428"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-428">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20071006070253/http://www.concacaf.com/about.asp" rel="nofollow">"About CONCACAF"</a>. <li id="cite_note-430"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-430">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation cs2 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source"><a class="external text" href="https://www.mediotiempo.com/beisbol/mexico-es-campeon-en-el-mundial-sub-23-de-beisbol" rel="nofollow">"México es Campeón en el Mundial Sub-23 de beisbol"</a> [Mexico is the World Baseball Champion in the Under-23 bracket], <i>Medio Tiempo</i> (in Spanish), 29 October 2018<span class="reference-accessdate">, retrieved <span class="nowrap">12 July</span> 2019</span></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Medio+Tiempo&amp;rft.atitle=M%C3%A9xico+es+Campe%C3%B3n+en+el+Mundial+Sub-23+de+beisbol&amp;rft.date=2018-10-29&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.mediotiempo.com%2Fbeisbol%2Fmexico-es-campeon-en-el-mundial-sub-23-de-beisbol&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMexico"></span></span>

<ul><li>Anna, Timothy. <i>Forging Mexico, 1821-1835</i>. Lincoln: University of Nebraska Press 1998.</li>
<li>Adams, Richard E.W. <i>Prehispanic Mesoamerica</i>. 3rd. ed. Norman: University of Oklahoma Press 2005.</li>
<li>Beezley, William H., ed. <i>A Companion to Mexican History and Culture</i>. Blackwell 2011. <link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/9781405190572" title="Special:BookSources/9781405190572">9781405190572</a></li>
<li>Bulmer-Thomas, Victor, <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/John_H._Coatsworth" title="John H. Coatsworth">John H. Coatsworth</a>, and Roberto Cortés Conde, eds. <i>The Cambridge Economic History of Latin America. Vol. 1, The Colonial Era and the Short Nineteenth Century</i>. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press 2006.</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Roderic_Ai_Camp" title="Roderic Ai Camp">Camp, Roderic Ai</a>. <i>Politics in Mexico: Democratic Consolidation or Decline?</i> (Oxford University Press, 2014)</li>
<li>Coerver, Don M., Suzanne B. Pasztor, and Robert M. Buffington. <i>Mexico: An Encyclopedia of Contemporary Culture and History</i>. Santa Barbara: ABCClio 2004. <link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/1-57607-132-4" title="Special:BookSources/1-57607-132-4">1-57607-132-4</a></li>
<li>Davis, Diane. <i>Urban Leviathan: Mexico City in the Twentieth Century</i> (Temple University Press, 2010)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Charles_A._Hale" title="Charles A. Hale">Hale, Charles A.</a> <i>The Transformation of Mexican Liberalism in Late Nineteenth-Century Mexico</i>. Princeton: Princeton University Press 1989.</li>
<li>Hamnett, Brian R. <i>Roots of Insurgency: Mexican Regions 1750-1824</i>. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press 1985.</li>
<li>Kirkwood, Burton. <i>The History of Mexico</i> (Greenwood, 2000) <a class="external text" href="https://www.questia.com/PM.qst?a=o&amp;d=15456726" rel="nofollow">online edition</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Alan_Knight_(historian)" title="Alan Knight (historian)">Knight, Alan</a>. <i>The Mexican Revolution</i>. 2 vols. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press 1986.</li>
<li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFKrauze1998"><a href="/wiki/Enrique_Krauze" title="Enrique Krauze">Krauze, Enrique</a> (1998). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=ZuuPAAZcKtYC" rel="nofollow"><i>Mexico: Biography of Power: A history of Modern Mexico 1810–1996</i></a>. New York: Harper Perennial. p. 896. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-06-092917-6" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-06-092917-6"><bdi>978-0-06-092917-6</bdi></a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Mexico%3A+Biography+of+Power%3A+A+history+of+Modern+Mexico+1810%E2%80%931996&amp;rft.place=New+York&amp;rft.pages=896&amp;rft.pub=Harper+Perennial&amp;rft.date=1998&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-06-092917-6&amp;rft.aulast=Krauze&amp;rft.aufirst=Enrique&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DZuuPAAZcKtYC&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMexico"></span></li>
<li>Levy, Santiago. <i>Good intentions, bad outcomes: Social policy, informality, and economic growth in Mexico</i> (Brookings Institution Press, 2010).</li>
<li>Merrill, Tim and Ramón Miró. <i>Mexico: a country study</i> (Library of Congress. Federal Research Division, 1996) US government document; not copyright <a class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/mexicocountrystu00merr_0" rel="nofollow">online free</a></li>
<li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFMeyerBeezley2000">Meyer, Michael C.; Beezley, William H., eds. Norman: University of Oklahoma Press 2020. <link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/9780806167077" title="Special:BookSources/9780806167077">9780806167077</a></li>

<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Authority_control_frameless&amp;#124;text-top&amp;#124;10px&amp;#124;alt=Edit_this_at_Wikidata&amp;#124;link=https&amp;#58;//www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q96#identifiers&amp;#124;class=noprint&amp;#124;Edit_this_at_Wikidata" class="navbox authority-control" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col"><div id="Authority_control_frameless&amp;#124;text-top&amp;#124;10px&amp;#124;alt=Edit_this_at_Wikidata&amp;#124;link=https&amp;#58;//www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q96#identifiers&amp;#124;class=noprint&amp;#124;Edit_this_at_Wikidata" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Help:Authority_control" title="Help:Authority control">Authority control</a> <a href="https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q96#identifiers" title="Edit this at Wikidata"><img alt="Edit this at Wikidata" class="noprint" data-file-height="20" data-file-width="20" decoding="async" height="10" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/8/8a/OOjs_UI_icon_edit-ltr-progressive.svg/10px-OOjs_UI_icon_edit-ltr-progressive.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/8/8a/OOjs_UI_icon_edit-ltr-progressive.svg/15px-OOjs_UI_icon_edit-ltr-progressive.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/8/8a/OOjs_UI_icon_edit-ltr-progressive.svg/20px-OOjs_UI_icon_edit-ltr-progressive.svg.png 2x" style="vertical-align: text-top" width="10"/></a></div></th></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%">General</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
